---
title: "Manage model documents"
date: last-modified
---

Add or delete documents available on individual models in your inventory.

::: {.attn}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] The model is registered in the model inventory.[^1]

EDIT THIS

- [x] You are a [{{< fa hand >}} Customer Admin]{.bubble} or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^2] 

:::

## Add model documents

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.^

3. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **{{< fa file >}} Documents**.

4. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Create Document**.

5. Enter in the document details: 

    - **[document title]{.smallcaps}** — Title of your document. A unique document ID will automatically be created from the name.
    - **[document type]{.smallcaps}**^ — The type of your document.
    - **[document source]{.smallcaps}** — Upload a PDF file or select from an existing document template.^

6. Click **Create Document** to add the document to your model.

## Delete documents

::: {.callout-important}
Deletion of documents on models is permanent and cannot be undone.
:::

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.^

3. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **{{< fa file >}} Documents**.

4. Hover over the document you want to delete.

5. When the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** appears, click on it and select [**{{< fa trash-can >}} Delete**]{.red} to remove the document.

6. After you confirm, the document type will be deleted from the model.


<!-- FOOTNOTES -->

[^1]: [Register models in the inventory](/guide/model-inventory/register-models-in-inventory.qmd)

[^2]: [Manage permissions](/guide/configuration/manage-permissions.qmd)
